properties.body:
NORTH SEA.
DNC 20.
SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
NOTICE BY M/V RAMFORM HYPERION TOWING TEN
2800 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
59-36.3N 002-25.3E, 59-26.3N 002-59.4E,
58-53.2N 002-22.4E, 58-53.2N 002-16.1E,
58-58.5N 001-56.5E, 59-01.4N 001-52.5E,
59-09.5N 001-56.1E.
THREE MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
